tool.name: Sambamba Sort
tool.description: Sort reads in a BAM file
tool.command:
sambamba_wrapper.py -p '
sambamba
sort
## Memory Limit? #if $memory_limit : --memory_limit=$memory_limit #end if
## Temp Dir? #if $tmp_dir : --tmpdir=$tmp_dir #end if
## Output BAM File? #if $output_bam : -o $output_bam #end if
## Sort By Name? #if $sort_by_name : --sort-by-name #end if
## Natural Sort? #if $natural_sort : --natural-sort #end if
## Compression Level? #if $compression_level : --compression-level=$compression_level #end if
## Uncompressed Chunks? #if $uncompressed_chunks : --uncompressed_chunks #end if
## Show Progress? #if $show_progress : --show-progress #end if
## Number of threads #if $num_threads : --nthreads=$num_threads #else --nthreads="\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-16}" #end if
## Filter Reads? #if $filter : --filter=$filter #end if
$input_bam_file
'

param.name: memory_limit
param.label: Memory Limit
param.help: Approximate total memory limit for all threads (by default 2GB)

param.name: sort_by_name
param.label: Sort By Name
param.help: Sort by read name instead of coordinate (lexicographical order)

param.name: natural_sort
param.label: Natural Sort
param.help: Sort by read name instead of coordinate (so-called 'natural' sort as in samtools)

param.name: compression_level
param.label: Compression Level
param.help: Compression level of the sorted BAM (from 0 to 9)

param.name: uncompressed_chunks
param.label: Uncompressed Chunks
param.help: Write sorted chunks as uncompressed BAM (default is writing with compression level 1), that might be faster in some cases but uses more disk space

param.name: filter
param.label: Filter Reads
param.help: Keep only reads that satisfy FILTER

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool uses the sambamba to sort reads in a BAM file.
lomereiter.github.io/sambamba/index.html https://github.com/lomereiter/sambamba
